params.title: Tool
params.caption: Select a tool from the toolbox.

tools.title: Token Generator
tools.description: Generate random tokens/strings with customizable character sets and length.

fields.title: Length
fields.caption: The length of the generated token (1-1024).

fields.title: Include Uppercase (ABC...)
fields.caption: Include uppercase letters A-Z in the token.

fields.title: Include Lowercase (abc...)
fields.caption: Include lowercase letters a-z in the token.

fields.title: Include Numbers (123...)
fields.caption: Include digits 0-9 in the token.

fields.title: Include Symbols
fields.caption: Include special symbols !()_+-=[]{}|;:,.? in the token.

fields.title: Number of Tokens
fields.caption: How many tokens to generate (1-100).

tools.title: UUID Generator
tools.description: Generate Universally Unique Identifiers (UUIDs) in various versions.

fields.title: UUID Version
fields.value: v1 - Time-based [v1], v4 - Random [v4], v6 - Reordered Time-based [v6], v7 - Unix Epoch Time-based [v7], Nil UUID (all zeros) [nil], Max UUID (all ones) [max]
fields.caption: Select the UUID version to generate.

fields.title: Format
fields.value: Standard (lowercase with dashes) [standard], Uppercase [uppercase], No dashes [nodashes], URN format [urn]
fields.caption: Select the output format for the UUID.

fields.title: Number of UUIDs
fields.caption: How many UUIDs to generate (1-100).

tools.title: Hash Text
tools.description: Hash a text string using multiple algorithms: MD5, SHA1, SHA256, SHA224, SHA512, SHA384, SHA3, RIPEMD160.

fields.title: Data Source
fields.value: Use text field below [field], Use job input data [input]
fields.caption: Choose where to get the text to hash from.

fields.title: Text to Hash
fields.caption: Enter the text string you want to hash. (Used when Data Source is 'text field')

fields.title: Input Data Path
fields.caption: Dot-notation path to the data field (e.g. 'user.name'). Leave empty to use entire input data as string. (Used when Data Source is 'input data')

fields.title: Digest Encoding
fields.value: Hexadecimal (base 16) [hex], Base64 [base64], Binary (raw) [binary]
fields.caption: Select the output encoding for the hash digests.

tools.title: QR Code Generator
tools.description: Generate a QR code for a URL or text with customizable colors and error correction.

fields.title: Data Source
fields.value: Use text field below [field], Use job input data [input]
fields.caption: Choose where to get the text/URL to encode.

fields.title: Text / URL
fields.caption: Enter the text or URL to encode in the QR code.

fields.title: Input Data Path
fields.caption: Dot-notation path to the data field. (Used when Data Source is 'input data')

fields.title: Foreground Color
fields.caption: Color of the QR code modules (dark parts).

fields.title: Background Color
fields.value: #ffffff
fields.caption: Background color of the QR code.

fields.title: Error Resistance
fields.value: Low (~7% recovery) [L], Medium (~15% recovery) [M], Quartile (~25% recovery) [Q], High (~30% recovery) [H]
fields.caption: Higher error correction allows the QR code to be read even if partially damaged.

fields.title: Image Size
fields.caption: Width/height of the generated PNG image in pixels (64-1024).

fields.title: Output Filename
fields.value: qrcode.png
fields.caption: Filename for the generated QR code image.

tools.title: IBAN Validator
tools.description: Validate IBAN (International Bank Account Number) and extract country, check digits, and BBAN.

fields.title: Data Source
fields.value: Use text field below [field], Use job input data [input]
fields.caption: Choose where to get the IBAN from.

fields.title: IBAN
fields.caption: Enter the IBAN to validate (spaces are allowed).

fields.title: Input Data Path
fields.caption: Dot-notation path to the data field. (Used when Data Source is 'input data')

tools.title: Passphrase Generator
tools.description: Generate secure, memorable passphrases using random words.

fields.title: Number of Words
fields.caption: Number of words in the passphrase (3-10).

fields.title: Max Word Length
fields.caption: Maximum length of each word in characters (3-15).

fields.title: Separator
fields.value: Hyphen (-) [hyphen], Space ( ) [space], Dot (.) [dot], Underscore (_) [underscore], None [none]
fields.caption: Character used to separate words.

fields.title: Capitalize Words
fields.caption: Capitalize the first letter of each word.

fields.title: Include Number
fields.caption: Add a random number (0-99) to the passphrase.

fields.title: Include Symbol
fields.caption: Add a random symbol (!@#$%^&*) to the passphrase.

fields.title: Number of Passphrases
fields.caption: How many passphrases to generate (1-20).

tools.title: Lorem Ipsum Generator
tools.description: Generate placeholder Lorem Ipsum text with customizable paragraphs, sentences, and word counts.

fields.title: Paragraphs
fields.caption: Number of paragraphs to generate (1-20).

fields.title: Sentences per paragraph
fields.caption: Number of sentences per paragraph (1-10).

fields.title: Words per sentence
fields.caption: Average number of words per sentence (3-25).

fields.title: Start with lorem ipsum ?
fields.caption: Begin the text with 'Lorem ipsum' for classic placeholder text.

fields.title: As html ?
fields.caption: Wrap paragraphs in HTML paragraph tags.

tools.title: Base64 Encoder/Decoder
tools.description: Encode or decode text using Base64 encoding.

fields.title: Mode
fields.value: Encode [encode], Decode [decode]
fields.caption: Choose to encode or decode.

fields.title: Data Source
fields.value: Use text field below [field], Use job input data [input]
fields.caption: Choose where to get the input text.

fields.title: Input Text
fields.caption: Text to encode or Base64 string to decode.

fields.title: Input Data Path
fields.caption: Dot-notation path to the data field. (Used when Data Source is 'input data')

tools.title: Timestamp Converter
tools.description: Convert between Unix timestamps, ISO 8601, and human-readable date formats.

fields.title: Input Format
fields.value: Current Time [now], Unix Timestamp (seconds) [unix], Unix Timestamp (milliseconds) [unixms], ISO 8601 Date [iso]
fields.caption: Select the format of your input.

fields.title: Data Source
fields.value: Use text field below [field], Use job input data [input]
fields.caption: Choose where to get the timestamp (ignored for 'Current Time').

fields.title: Input Value
fields.caption: The timestamp or date to convert (leave empty for 'Current Time').

fields.title: Input Data Path
fields.caption: Dot-notation path to the data field. (Used when Data Source is 'input data')

tools.title: JSON Formatter
tools.description: Prettify, minify, or validate JSON data.

fields.title: Mode
fields.value: Prettify [prettify], Minify [minify], Validate Only [validate]
fields.caption: Choose the operation to perform.

fields.title: Data Source

fields.caption: Choose where to get the JSON.

fields.title: JSON Input
fields.caption: Paste your JSON here.

fields.title: Input Data Path

fields.title: Data Source

fields.title: Input Data Path

tools.title: Image Converter

fields.title: Input File

fields.title: Output Format
fields.value: PNG [png], JPEG [jpg], BMP [bmp], GIF [gif], TIFF [tiff]

fields.title: Resize Mode
fields.value: No Resize [none], By Width (maintain aspect) [width], By Height (maintain aspect) [height], Exact Dimensions [dimensions], By Percentage [percent]

fields.title: Width / Percentage
fields.caption: Target width in pixels, or percentage for 'By Percentage' mode.

fields.title: Height

fields.title: Data Source
